header.browserupgrade: I know that you have a special loyalty to IE, but he is a bit too old... you should at least upgrade it to IE 11!
header.noscript: You blocked javascript! If you do this, we will not be able to send the package to you!

privacy: This product is not affiliated with the game Minecraft, Mojang AB or Microsoft.

ChangeSetting.title: Account Settings | Global blacklist

Email.addMSG: The email address needs to be reconfirmed for the modification. If you log out before you confirm, you will not be able to log in again. You need to confirm before you can log in (you can still modify it again without logging out)

Pass.NotMach: The password was entered incorrectly twice~~
condition: At least one English capital letter
At least one English small letter
Cannot be the same as the email address or name

2FA.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
2FA.is_not_Enable: Enable two-factor authentication! Add an extra layer of protection to your account, one less annoyance~ (～￣▽￣)～
is_Enable: Note down the security code so you can use it if you lose your phone. Keep it safe. ╰ (￣ω￣o)
The account will not be used without a security code, you will need to contact customer service to retrieve the account. <(_ _)>

body: Scan the QR Code below with the Two-Factor Authentication Program on your phone (such as Google Authenticator)!! (｡A｡)
Failure? Can't scan? You can try to enter the code below! (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧

TwoFA_confirm_off_modal.title: Serious?
TwoFA_confirm_off_modal.body: After reset, your account there will be less protection and more trouble. Do you really want to do this? (⊙﹏⊙)

TwoFA_BackupCode_modal.title: Security Code
TwoFA_BackupCode_modal.body: These are your security code, please keep it in a safe place. Of course it is best to encrypt it! （￣︶￣）↗

AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_OFF_FAIL: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_CHECK_CODE_FAIL: Re-scan and enter again~ or you entered it wrong (If the situation persists, please contact customer service staff)
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_CHECK_CODE_OK: The next time you log in, you need to enter this mysterious code!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_SHOWBACKUPCODE_FA: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_DATA_OK_EMAIL: <b>Last step!</ b> Hurry up and check in your email!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_DATA_FAIL: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_DATA_FAIL_NOT_MATCH: The name is too long or the email format is incorrect...
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_OK: Remember to sign in with your new password!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_FAIL: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_FAIL_NOT_STRONG: The password is not too strong!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_FAIL_NOT_MATCH: The passwords you enter are not the same!

Login.title: Login | Global blacklist
Login.go_register: You don't have an account and want to use it? Register now
Login.WRONG_PASS: Oh Nooooo! Email or password is wrong!
Login.NOT_DOEN: Hey! It’s not okay to be so anxious! Go check the mailbox!
Login.REGISTER_COMPLETE: Yes! You are done! Go and login now!
BLOCK_10: Sorry~~ You have failed too many times! Wait 10 minutes and try again~~
If you forget your password, you can try retrieve your password
BLOCK_30: Sorry~~ You have failed too many times! Wait for 30 minutes and try again~~
If you forget your password, you can try retrieve your password

TwoFA.welcome: Hello! Get the mysterious code from your mobile app
TwoFA.ReDo: Is the account entered incorrectly? Re-enter
TwoFA.Can't_use_phone:
Can’t use the phone?
You can directly enter 1 of the 12 security codes （づ￣3￣）づ╭❤～

Register.title: Register | Global blacklist
Register.EMAIL_FAIL: Ah Oh! Email can't be sent! Check if you have made a mistake~~
Register.PASS_NOT_MATCH: Ah Oh! The password entered twice is not the same!
Register.PASS_NOT_STRONG: Umm.. The password is not too strong!
Register.EMAIL_WRONG_FORMAT: Umm.. The email address should not be like this!
Register.NAME_TOO_LONG: Ah Oh! The name is too long to remember!
Register.LAST_STEP: The last step! Come to your mailbox and check it out!
Register.NEED_AGREE: Sorry~~ You need to agree Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to register.
Register.YOUR_BOT: Ah Oh! You are a robot! Can't register! (or you didn't verify it)
Register.welcome: If you want to use it, register it
Register.Name: Name
condition: At least one English capital letter
At least one English small letter
Cannot be the same as the email address or name

ForgotPass.title: Forgot password | Global blacklist
ForgotPass.EMAIL_FAIL: Ah Oh! Email can't be sent! Check if you have made a mistake~~
ForgotPass.LASTSTEP: The last two steps! Come to your mailbox and check it out!
ForgotPass.COMPLETE: Yes! You are done! Log in with your new password now!
ForgotPass.YOUR_BOT: Ah Oh! You are a robot! Can't register! (or you didn't verify it)
ForgotPass.welcome: Forgot your password? Come and get him back!
ForgotPass.Email_Tips: The email address you used to sign up for your account
ForgotPass.PASS_NOT_MATCH: Ah Oh! The password entered twice is not the same!
ForgotPass.PASS_NOT_STRONG: Umm.. The password is not too strong!
ForgotPass.welcome2: Come on! Enter a new password!
condition: At least one English capital letter
At least one English small letter
Cannot be the same as the email address or name

Error_Page.404_title: Where have you been! | Global blacklist
Error_Page.something_happened: Ohh Noo! Dead fire! It something happened!

Block_login.title: Login Blocked!!
Block_login.detailed:
You have quickly blocked this login!!
Hurry up and change your password as soon as possible before the other party responds!! (๑•̀ᄇ•́)و✧

activated.subject: Last step! Just fine!
content: Last step! Click down! That's it!
The link is only valid for 1 day! Grasp the time!
If the button doesn't respond, just move the link below to the browser!
If you have any questions, please send an email to
privacy: This product is not affiliated with the game Minecraft, Mojang AB or Microsoft.

forgetPass.subject: The reset password you requested, is sent!
content: Last step! Click down! Change your password! That's it!
The link is only valid for 1 hour! Grasp the time!
If the button doesn't respond, just move the link below to the browser!
If you have any questions, please send an email to
privacy: This product is not affiliated with the game Minecraft, Mojang AB or Microsoft.

Wong-newIP.subject: Someone is logged in to your account! Σ(っ °Д °;)っ
content: Someone has logged into your account in a different place!
We recommend that you check the following information to see is doesn't your own login
If you are logged in, you don't need to pay attention. Otherwise, please block this login immediately!ヽ(≧□≦)ノ
Click me to block this login
If the button doesn't respond, just move the link below to the browser!
Wong-newIP.Äny-question: If you have any questions, please send an email to
privacy: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
This product is not part of Minecraft, Mojang AB or Microsoft Games.

Form.Cant_EMPTY: This is not to be left empty
Form.Error_format: The email format should not be like this
Form.Not_checked: If you don't pick, we can't continue.
Form.Check_bot: I need to know who you are

2FA.content: This is your security code, please keep it in a safe place. Of course it is best to encrypt it! (￣︶￣) ↗
